item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Install postmarketOS on Android phone and use Docker as a home server (145 points | 58 comments)
2. Tokyo government gives workers 4-day workweek to boost fertility, family time (61 points | 16 comments)
3. The Unplanned Impact of Mathematics (2011) (51 points | 16 comments)
4. Romanian court annuls result of presidential election first round (109 points | 156 comments)
5. The dogs of Chernobyl: Insights into populations in the nuclear exclusion zone (29 points | 1 comment)
6. Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct (108 points | 22 comments)
7. Show HN: BunkerWeb – The Open-Source Web Application Firewall (WAF) (77 points | 19 comments)
8. TikTok divestment law upheld by federal appeals court (123 points | 150 comments)
9. Show HN: Hacker Herald – like HN but with crowdsourced pics and subtitles (148 points | 58 comments)
10. Show HN: Prompt Engine – Auto pick LLMs based on your prompts (65 points | 12 comments)
11. Debian opens a can of username worms (111 points | 144 comments)
12. Hit men aren't what you think (6 points | 4 comments)
13. Constraints Are Good: Python's Metadata Dilemma (41 points | 13 comments)
14. ExxonMobil's Alleged Hack-for-Hire Campaign Targeting Climate Activists (180 points | 38 comments)
15. Trailbase: Fast, single-file, open-source app server built using Rust and SQLite (268 points | 89 comments)
16. Sensible SQLite Defaults (63 points | 21 comments)
17. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (56 points | 30 comments)
18. RankScience (YC W17) is hiring to supercharge SEO for startups ( | hide)
19. Forensic linguists use grammar, syntax and vocabulary to help crack cold cases (39 points | 26 comments)
20. New Box64 v0.3.2 and Box86 v0.3.8 released (Native Flags, Benchmarks, Box32) (19 points | 7 comments)
21. Reverse engineering the Ravensburger TipToi pen (78 points | 42 comments)
22. Portland airport grows with expansive mass timber roof canopy (372 points | 230 comments)
23. Contradictions in photography advice (39 points | 44 comments)
24. Intel’s board, and an example of when boards and short-termism fail (313 points | 225 comments)
25. Wrote a custom libc for POSIX and x86-64 (5 points | 2 comments)
26. Show HN: Piazza, syncing the web in a vectorized DB (14 points | 4 comments)
27. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (247 points | 217 comments)
28. Intuitive introverts lead the most successful teams: study (66 points | 38 comments)
29. The 70% problem: Hard truths about AI-assisted coding (487 points | 373 comments)
30. Why is printer ink so expensive? (69 points | 80 comments)
